отзывы клиентов

Irina Ivanchenko
2 half marathons
I didn’t know what to buy for myself - I turned to the guys from RunSmart - picked up. A heart rate monitor that fits my goals and financial capabilities. After a while, I decided to update the gadget - without hesitation I turned to the same place.

New goals - a new gadget!

Thank RunSmart
Ivan Semochkin
1 half marathon
Cool thing is a heart rate monitor. Usually I ran without them. It turns out only worse than yourself did. I bought a heart rate monitor and received a workout as a present. Together with me, we had the first training, taught to use a new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy, made a training plan a month in advance.

With them I prepared for my first half marathon! Thank!!!
Yuri Dashkin
2 half marathons
For a long time I could not start running, because started several times before, but it became hard and I quit. I heard from friends about RunSmart and running with heart rate control and decided to try.

I called, the guys took an interest in my goals and picked up a very interesting option at a discount! Now run and enjoy the run! I have already run 2 half marathons and several shorter ones races and does not intend to stop!

Thank!!!
Moscow, Myasnitsky passage, 3s1
